body:
Welp another post by me old vs [aka: Max] Learn my name people!!!

So i've been wanting to combine texture packs to make into one so it could be used in any kind of PVP

- Soup PVP
- Pot PVP
- Standard
- UHC
etc..

So if you would like to suggest resource packs.. please do so, it would be very much appreciated :D

Make sure its not an Edited texture pack like: Eum3's Faithful edit, or Scavs's default edit, i would like to just combine the texture packs like they are but edit the swords and fire :)
body_tagged:

title: Need Resource packs...

replies.body:
Morsinius pack (A faithful 64x PvP edit)
Plast pack (A default PvP edit)
Upscaled (A 32x PvP edit)
Maple pack (32x optimisted faithful PvP edit)

replies.body: I recommend YouAintString's custom default pack.It is awesome because it's all default,but has  bow meter, low fire, clear inv,etc.You can edit it to add custom particles which I did and add a couple of things to your liking.
